WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

right now it is not possible to define replacements across vendors or products. Please add the feature.


Regards
Norbert

Comments.Message:
This why it is recommended to NOT put version/release number in the product name.
"Flash Player" is a product, not "Flash Player 11" (it's more likely an udpate).
Yes, but is this a recommendation or a hard rule/limit? ;)

Let's say, it's a best practice :-)

I will look into this in WPP V2

OK, would be nice to have this Feature, although I'll try to redesign my products. ;) But nonetheless, I can imagine Scenarios where this Feature would be helpful.

regards
Norbert
